metadata.title: CVE-2022-28731 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A carefully crafted request on UserPreferences.jsp could trigger an CSRFvulnerability on Apache JSPWiki before 2.11.3, which could allow theattacker to modify the email associated with the attacked account, and thena reset password request from the login page.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
